gears.sidescroller.world.core

Interface Interactable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlacedGearMachine
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface Interactable
    Implement this interface in a class to specify that something should happen when a Player interacts with the object.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean interactWith(Player p)
      Use this method to specify how this object checks if a Player is interacting with it, as well as what it should do when an interaction occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • interactWith

        boolean interactWith(Player p)
        Use this method to specify how this object checks if a Player is interacting with it, as well as what it should do when an interaction occurs.
        Parameters:
        p - the player to potentially interact with.
        Returns:
        whether or not the Player is interacting with this. (Pro-tip: check if they are colliding with this)
